org.jfree.ui.tabbedui
Class RootPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.jfree.ui.tabbedui.RootPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, RootEditor
public abstract class RootPanel
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements RootEditor

A root panel is a panel implementation of an root editor.

Author:
Thomas Morgner

Serialized Form
